queries.select: select a.YMD from FX_CO_DATE a where ifnull(a.SPECL_DOW_CD, a.DOW_CD) = ( select DOW_CD from FX_CO_DATE a1 where a1.YMD = $date ) and a.YMD < $date order by a.YMD desc limit 0, $count

select IFNULL(a.ALCD_NO, 0) as ALCD_NO , a.FAC_TID , a.POINT_ID , a.POINT_TID , a.POINT_NM , b.MO_NO , b.MO_NAME , b.MO_CLASS , b.MO_TID from FX_PS_POINT a , FX_MO b where a.MO_TID = b.MO_TID and b.DEL_YN = 'N'
